definition: to tend/to take care of sb
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康复。

sentences.english: Perhaps an import-export situation will need all your tender loving care.
sentences.chinese: 可能是一个需要你全部细致照料的进出口买卖。

sentences.english: Conclusion The quality of life for Dementia's care giver was positively co-related with social support.
sentences.chinese: 结论老年痴呆照料者的生活质量与社会支持呈正相关。

sentences.english: Third, there was the problem of rounding up all the animals and then caring for them.
sentences.chinese: 每三，挪亚如何把所有动物凑在一起，并照料他们？

sentences.english: He entrusted his child to a faithful friend.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的孩子委托给一位忠实的朋友照料。

sentences.english: The tropical plants thrived well under our care.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的照料下，这些热带植物茁壮生长。

sentences.english: I'm sure the girl will be able to look out for herself.
sentences.chinese: 我相信女孩会自己照料好自己的。

sentences.english: She stayed at home and looked after her mother yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 来日诰日她呆正在家里照料她母亲了。

sentences.english: With the nurse's careful attendance, the patient finally recovered.
sentences.chinese: 经过护士的悉心照料，那个病人终于恢复了健康。

sentences.english: Not quite as magnificent without my grandfather's special touch.
sentences.chinese: 没有祖父特别的照料，钟都没以前那么宏伟了。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Mr Abbas could stay in charge as a caretaker.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，阿巴斯将会继续照料政务。

sentences.english: May I depend on you to stand by me and my daughters, then, deer-slayer?
sentences.chinese: 如此说来，我可以指望你照料我和女儿了，杀鹿人？

sentences.english: The patient nurse ministered to the dying old man.
sentences.chinese: 耐心的护士照料着那个垂死的老人。

sentences.english: To forget how to dig the earth and tend the soil is to forget ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 忘却如何翻耕和照料土地等于忘了我们自己。

sentences.english: It's a satisfying ritual of continuity and caretaking.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种令人心满意足的连续性和照料的仪式。

sentences.english: He gained 17 lb. after only a week in the Americans' care.
sentences.chinese: 在美国人的照料下，一周过去他就涨了17磅。

definition: to take care of/to show consideration/to attend to/to look after
to look after/to attend to/to have in care
to nurse/to look after/to watch over/(old) hospital nurse
to attend to the needs of (an invalid, disabled person etc)/caregiver
to attend to/to care for (patients etc)/to look after/to wait upon/to serve/also written 伏侍, see also 服事[fu2 shi4]
to look after/to tend (one's crops, garden, livestock, pets etc)/to repair
to take care/to keep an eye on/to look after/to tell/to remind
